sentences.sContent: It is right and proper that parents take responsibility for their children's attendance at school.
sentences.sCn: 父母负责督促子女上学上课，这是天经地义的事。

sentences.sContent: He is always perfectly proper in his behaviour.
sentences.sCn: 他的行为举止向来是无可挑剔的。

sentences.sContent: ...as around 75% of the local harvest goes to waste thanks to a lack of proper storage facilities...
...More than 80% of those cases can be attributed to contact with contaminated water and a lack of proper sanitation...
...To which the proper response is LOL...
...Kumar that to bring a hand gun into Hong Kong without proper authorization is a serious offense...
...you can see shopping malls full of designer goods right next door to the slum areas without proper water or electricity supplies...
...where sustainable development is often taken as the sole measure of progress without a proper appreciation of historical and cultural perspectives...

synos.tran: 适当的；本身的；特有的；正派的

phrases.pCn: 适当的时候；[物理]原时；本征时间
本征函数；本寨数，特寨数
